virtual void isys::ICriticalSection::Enter (  )  [pure virtual]

Enter to critical section.

You have to call Leave() if you entered the section.

Implemented in iqt::CCriticalSection.

virtual bool isys::ICriticalSection::EnterIfFree (  )  [pure virtual]

Enter to critical section if it is not blocked.

Returns:
true, if section was entered, false otherwise.

Implemented in iqt::CCriticalSection.
